mapper.select: select from TSSO_MENU ORDER by MENU_ORDER_NUM DESC
select from TSSO_MENU ORDER by MENU_ORDER_NUM ASC
select case when max(MENU_ORDER_NUM) is null then 1 else max(MENU_ORDER_NUM)+1 end ORDERNUM from TSSO_MENU
select * from TSSO_MENU where MENU_ORDER_NUM = (select max(MENU_ORDER_NUM) from TSSO_MENU where MENU_ORDER_NUM<(select MENU_ORDER_NUM from TSSO_MENU where MENU_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
select * from TSSO_MENU where MENU_ORDER_NUM = (select min(MENU_ORDER_NUM) from TSSO_MENU where MENU_ORDER_NUM>(select MENU_ORDER_NUM from TSSO_MENU where MENU_ID=#{Id,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}))
select from TSSO_MENU where MENU_SYSTEM_ID=#{systemId} ORDER by MENU_ORDER_NUM ASC

select TSSO_MENU.* from TSSO_MENU join TSSO_AUTHORITY on TSSO_MENU.MENU_ID=TSSO_AUTHORITY.AUTH_OBJ_ID join TSSO_ROLE on TSSO_AUTHORITY.AUTH_OWNER_ID=TSSO_ROLE.ROLE_ID join TSSO_USER_ROLE on TSSO_ROLE.ROLE_ID=TSSO_USER_ROLE.BIND_ROLE_ID where TSSO_USER_ROLE.BIND_USER_ID=#{userId} and TSSO_MENU.MENU_SYSTEM_ID=#{systemId} order by TSSO_MENU.MENU_ORDER_NUM ASC
